'''<code>tile.deprecated_purpur_block_2.name</code>''', presumably intended to be named '''smooth purpur''', is an unobtainable block in the [[purpur]] family, which appears identical to standard [[purpur block]]s.

== Obtaining ==
This block is not normally obtainable, and commands are therefore required; e.g. {{cmd|give @s purpur_block 1 3}}

=== Breaking ===
tile.deprecated_purpur_block_2.name can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, it drops nothing.
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|deprecated purpur block 2|Pickaxe|Wood}}

== Usage ==
tile.deprecated_purpur_block_2.name can be used as a construction material much like regular purpur blocks.

=== Note Blocks ===
tile.deprecated_purpur_block_2.name can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
